name: Card Monsters
description:
Card Monsters is a simple and fast mobile card strategy game. Equipping monster cards will make you unprecedentedly powerful!

Game Features:
1. Fast-paced for 1 round
Players will finish one battle within 5 mins. One Stop, One Battle!
2. Fast card collection(10 card packs daily!) cards.
Battle rewards and quests to gain sufficient
3. Fast learning by simple rules.
Simple battle rules and fast learning. Use your brain to win the battle.
4.Equipping cards makes you more powerful !
First TCG Mobile Game that monster cards could be equipped and upgrade.

Follow us on Facebook for latest news: fb.me/cardmonstersen
